ygData.msgSnippet: This is ridiculous.  Images summoned by an archmage aren t NPCs, right? wrong.  I have a scenario where it s Save-the-NPCs and every NPC has a potion of

This is ridiculous.  Images summoned by an archmage aren't NPCs, 
right?

wrong.  I have a scenario where it's Save-the-NPCs and every NPC has a 
potion of invulvernability on it so they can't be killed.  But my 
archmage summons an image that gets killed and damn, I lost the 
scenario just because the damn image was killed.

(Yes, I am taking my 100% legitimate team through the last of my 
scenarios to determine final stats.)
